title: e-mail
content: Unable to receive e-mail via Mozilla Thunderbird. Receive message Server imap.shaw.ca has disconnected. Contacted server, informed that the email is all good. the problem is with the thunderbird application you will have to contact the thunderbird customer care because the email is all fine from our end. Also the shaw webmail is working fine so that means from our end everything is good.
creator: rgalois

title: Moving email data
content: When my 10 year old Windows laptop died it was a main board problem not a disk problem. I pulled the disk and can access it from my new Windows 11 laptop. Is the import tool the correct tool to pull all the Thunderbird data from the old disk and merge it with my new Thunderbird installation? Are there instructions available?
creator: rgounaud

title: Sending emails to group in address book
content: I have established a group in Thunderbird. I want to send a group email to all the individuals in my group. I believe that in the past I could click on the group name in the address book and have all the emails within the group come up in the To line of the email. Now I have to click on the group and then on each individual, which sends their email to the To line, but then when I click on the second person, the email is sent to the individual in the To line of a new email. How can I choose at one time all the emails of individuals in the group?
creator: cherimadison

title: gmail emails that have disappeared
content: We use Mozilla for all our email accounts, and yesterday morning it temporarily crashed. We now can't access any gmail emails , apart from February 2024. Can you please help us retrieve our emails?
creator: warrandytecw
